title: singam irukkirAn
sahitya:
singam irukkirAn anjAdE narasingam irukkirAn manamE


anupallavi

  tangat-taNal pOlE sattiya jyOtiyAi dAsarai varuttiDum nIcarai azhittiDa


caraNam    pAttiramAghiya bhakta prahlAdanai paghaittu toghaittu migha bhangam paDuttiya
nAttika kanakanai Attiram tIravE naghattAl piLanda viSNu nArAyaNan vIra
